Definition.Remarks: Does nothing except waste space.

Definition.Name: killfeed_message
Definition.Description: Prints a message to the killfeed.
Definition.Remarks: Any sound index other than -1 (none) crashes the game.

Definition.Name: timer_set_rate
Definition.Description: Sets the direction and speed of a timer.

Definition.Remarks: Does nothing.

Definition.Remarks: Do not use this directly.

Definition.Name: object_set_boundary_visibility

Definition.Name: random
Definition.Description: Generates a random number between 0 and max.

Definition.Remarks: Does nothing.

Definition.Name: object_get_velocity
Definition.Remarks: This is used to represent KPH in Race in Halo: Reach.

Definition.Name: player_toggle_modes
Definition.Remarks: Unused in the retail version of Halo 4.

Definition.Name: object_get_owner_player2
Definition.Remarks: Object get owner player biped?? needs to be checked

Definition.Name: object_push_up_random
Definition.Remarks: This is used in Headhunter to have the skulls "spill" around the player. This action stacks and typically needs to be executed more than once to push up heavy objects.

Definition.Name: widget_set_meter
Definition.Remarks: Does not appear to work in the retail version of Halo 4.

Definition.Name: widget_set_icon
Definition.Remarks: Does not appear to work in the retail version of Halo 4.

Definition.Name: object_spawn_halfway
Definition.Description: Creates an object located in the middle between object1 and object2.

Definition.Remarks: Does nothing.
Matt: Doesn't do anything noticeable when the object ref is an AA on the ground.

Definition.Remarks: Should be used in a local trigger.

Definition.Name: automatic_scoring_toggle
Definition.Remarks: If set to false, the script has to manage scoring and winning.

Definition.Name: waypoint_toggle_blip
Definition.Remarks: Slower blinking.

Definition.Name: player_set_respawn_delay
Definition.Description: Sets the duration the player is stuck looking at your corpse when you die -- very similar to respawning in campaign.
Definition.Remarks: This action also affects the initial loadout screen. The duration parameter is multiplied with a game time globals field.

Definition.Name: player_is_getting_assassinated
Definition.Remarks: If the player parameter is null, this action will return 1.
CTF flag pickup precondition: object1 = player biped, object2 = flag, result must equal 1 in order to pick up
